description:
In the past year, we’ve seen remarkable achievements across AI-assisted cancer diagnosis as more and more clinicians test, use and integrate AI companions into daily practice. Skin cancer is no exception, and we expect AI diagnostic tools to be widely implemented across this clinical arena in the future. What does AI assistance look like for... Read more »

The post AI’s role in helping to prevent skin cancer through behaviour change appeared first on AI News.
title: AI’s role in helping to prevent skin cancer through behaviour change
